page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: {Car}is the main means of transport for nearly 80% of people in this area because the houses are widely spread and the only{bus}service - to{Hereford - does not run very frequently. There used to be a railway line called the {Golden Valley railway}which ran from Pontrilas northwards but this was closed some years ago. Many people therefore need their cars for local travel, for their work or for shopping in Hereford or Abergavenny and so the {2 garages}in Ewyas Harold are very important. One of these sells{petrol, deals in second-hand cars and does some servicing while the other only does repairs and{servicing.}About 75% of people in the area buy petrol and have their cars serviced locally.
